column2: UPDATE 77: #important #HolyFire #evacuation #order #cancelations from @CAL_FIRE: https://t.co/9s4i5DwLr8
Northern California went through some horrific fires last year and the exact same communities are getting hit again this year. Lake County, for example, is again under an evacuation order.

The state the ground is in now, with the cranes up outside, there was no way in hell they were going to get those taken down, get several evacuation protocols tested, approved, and get the ground in working order for full functional use in one month. There was no way.

My dad said on a large scale project like that at least 2-3 months is dedicated to testing and safety. Have to fill it up half way and make sure every fire exit, evacuation protocol, fire exit are in swift working order
Many of people at my work are on evacuation order.
